2504.07373.title: ChronoFormer: Time-Aware Transformer Architectures for Structured Clinical Event Modeling
2504.07373.paper_summary:
The temporal complexity of electronic health record (EHR) data presents
significant challenges for predicting clinical outcomes using machine learning.
This paper proposes ChronoFormer, an innovative transformer based architecture
specifically designed to encode and leverage temporal dependencies in
longitudinal patient data. ChronoFormer integrates temporal embeddings,
hierarchical attention mechanisms, and domain specific masking techniques.
Extensive experiments conducted on three benchmark tasks mortality prediction,
readmission prediction, and long term comorbidity onset demonstrate substantial
improvements over current state of the art methods. Furthermore, detailed
analyses of attention patterns underscore ChronoFormer's capability to capture
clinically meaningful long range temporal relationships.
2504.07373.paper_summary_zh: <paragraph>電子健康紀錄 (EHR) 資料的時間複雜性，對於使用機器學習預測臨床結果來說，是一項重大挑戰。本文提出 ChronoFormer，這是一種基於 Transformer 的創新架構，專門用於編碼和利用縱向患者資料中的時間依賴性。ChronoFormer 整合了時間嵌入、階層式注意力機制和特定領域的遮罩技術。在三個基準任務（死亡率預測、再入院預測和長期共病發作）上進行的大量實驗證明，它比目前的先進方法有顯著的改進。此外，對注意力模式的詳細分析突顯了 ChronoFormer 捕捉具有臨床意義的長期時間關係的能力。</paragraph>
2504.07373.author: Yuanyun Zhang et.al.
